sentences.sContent: The economy is showing signs of faltering.
My mother’s grip upon the household never faltered.
sentences.sCn: 我母亲对全家人的管束从没放松过。

remMethod.val: f + alter(改变) → 忽然改变立场， 不再理直气壮 → (声音)发抖， 结巴地说

trans.tranCn: 衰退， 衰落； 发抖， 结巴地说； 蹒跚
trans.tranOther: to become weaker and unable to continue in an effective way
